name: LifeTime Incorporated
description:
Work in an office stamping paper just to keep living! Its just like Capitalism!

I'm honestly actually pretty happy with this! As with all my games its still cut short due to time constraints, but there's enough "Game" here that I don't feel like I ran out of time. There's a lot more that I wanted to do, sure, but I'm content with whats here and I hope you enjoy!
